answers.answer: You need to ask your Dr. Some have you fast, some do not.

If your doctor did not tell you to fat then no reason to. I don't even know y a few doctors have ppl do ir bc most do not. I did not fast for either of my pregnancies and have had 2 doctors it isx rally just not necessary. So no worries. Just don't easy anything sugary for breakfast. Have some eggs toast, oatmeal etc you know :-)
I didn't have to but I didn't eat two hours before just in case it would make the test off and I passed
Yess I agree with cecilia_morgan & Elena2220... I didnt fast and passed the test just dont eat anything sugary b4 you go.... You will be Just Fine!

I was told not to eat or drink anything but water two hours prior. That was one of my concerns because I've heard some doctors do have you fast starting at midnight. (Kinda like they'd have you do for surgery) with my appointment at 1:30pm, I cant go that long without eating or it makes me feel really sick. Thankfully he didnt have me do that though

question: I go to the doctor tomorrow for my gestational diabetes test! Am I not supposed to eat after midnight tonight?
title: GD test
